title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails.
OB: Exporting files with the same name under different directories results in an error during the zip file creation process.
EB: The zip file should be successfully created, containing all the files with the same name under different directories without any errors.
SR:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects. 
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt'). 
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export,' and choose 'Zip File' to export. 
4. Observe the error during the export process.
